title: 'The Three-Legged Pot' featuring Aparna Nancherla
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Comedian Aparna Nancherla (The Standups, Corporate) stars as a rambunctious, Robin Hood-esque cooking vessel in this Danish and Middle Eastern story about generosity and greed.
